notes: Tulum beachfront boutique hotel, member of Small Luxury Hotels. Has a dedicated Collaborations page (lavalisetulum.com/collaborations) inviting content creators and influencers. Operated by Namron Hospitality.
Tulum beachfront boutique, one of Tulum Beach's original properties. Operated by Namron Hospitality. Shared press/media contact for all Namron properties.
12-room beachfront boutique, member of Design Hotels. Operated by Namron Hospitality. Has dedicated Press page confirming press@namronhospitality.com as media contact.
Boutique jungle hotel in Tulum, bohemian design. Operated by Namron Hospitality. Influencer and brand collaboration inquiries go through Namron's press email.
Boutique beachfront hotel in Tulum, operated by Namron Hospitality. Has a press page confirming media@namronhospitality.com / press@namronhospitality.com as contact.

22-suite luxury collection in Tankah Bay, Tulum. Member of Small Luxury Hotels. Certified Zero Waste Establishment since 2023. Operated by Namron Hospitality — influencer collabs via press@namronhospitality.com.
Luxury beachfront hotel in Tulum, formerly Pablo Escobar's estate. Very social-media-friendly property. Press page exists at casamalca.com/press. Reservations also at reservations@casamalca.com.
Award-winning boutique hotel and community in Tulum. 146K Instagram followers. Has dedicated Press page at ourhabitas.com/press confirming press@ourhabitas.com.

Yoga and wellness resort in Tulum, celebrity favorite. Has a dedicated Influencer Program page (amansala.com/influencers) with tiered requirements (10K+ followers, 2.5%+ engagement). Influencer program actively invites creators.

Iconic beachfront hotel + beach club in Tulum, member of Design Hotels. Conde Nast Traveller Readers' Choice Awards 2024 winner. Known for full-moon parties and DJ events — extremely social-media-friendly. Also viptables@papayaplayaproject.com for events.

Forbes Five-Star rated luxury boutique hotel near Tulum (Xpu-Ha). World's 50 Best Hotels 2023 & 2024. Three Michelin Keys 2025. Described as 'a boutique beacon for the art, media, and design crowd.' Very influencer-friendly.

Luxury beachfront boutique hotel in Soliman Bay near Tulum. 28K Instagram followers. General contact: contact@jashitahotel.com, Reservations: reservation@jashitahotel.com, Concierge: concierge@jashitahotel.com.
Adults-only luxury boutique hotel inside Tulum Jaguar National Park. Member of Small Luxury Hotels. 32K Instagram followers. Part of the Colibri Boutique Hotels collection.

brand_name: La Zebra Tulum (a Colibri Boutique Hotel)
notes: Beachfront boutique hotel in Tulum, member of Small Luxury Hotels. 45K Instagram followers. Known for authentic Mexican cuisine and beach club. Part of Colibri Boutique Hotels collection.
Moroccan-inspired luxury boutique hotel on Tulum Beach. Beachfront with beach club. Active Instagram presence. Contact also via +52 984 745 2107.
Michelin Guide-listed boutique hotel in Tulum, member of Small Luxury Hotels. Every room features a private plunge pool. 28K Instagram followers. First G Hotels property.

Social-first hotel brand with locations in Cancun, Tulum, Los Cabos, and Isla Mujeres. Has a dedicated Influencer Partnership page (mayanmonkey.com/influencers-partnership). Also support@mayanmonkey.com. Explicitly invites influencers to collaborate.

Luxury eco resort on Mexico's Pacific coast near Juluchuca. Has a dedicated Influencer page (playaviva.com/influencers) with tiered packages: 150K+ followers = complimentary room for 2; 1M+ followers = airfare included. Regenerative travel focus.

Award-winning luxury resort in Cancun. 201K Instagram followers. Member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. Has dedicated press page (nizuc.com/press) and confirmed media@nizuc.com as the media inquiries contact.

Ultra-luxury resort within the private Mayakoba enclave, Riviera Maya. Has a dedicated media press kit page. General press: press@mayakoba.com. Instagram: @rwmayakoba. Very social-media-documented property.

Private luxury resort enclave in Riviera Maya encompassing Fairmont, Rosewood, Banyan Tree and Andaz hotels. Has a shared press contact for the whole estate. Active news/press section at mayakoba.com/news.

5-star luxury resort within Mayakoba, Riviera Maya. Has dedicated Press Room (fairmont-mayakoba.com/press-room) with Influencer Collaboration Request Form and Media Visit Request Form. PR managed by Zapwater Communications (US press office).

Two Michelin Keys, AAA Five Diamond resort within Mayakoba, Riviera Maya. 122K Instagram followers. Experiences: experienceconcierge-mayakoba@banyantree.com. Actively featured in influencer content (Rosewood vs Banyan Tree viral content).

Adults-only luxury villa resort in Playa del Carmen. Has dedicated Press and Partnerships pages. PR managed by Purple PR. Also: reservationsviceroy@viceroyhotelsandresorts.com. Partnerships page: viceroyhotelsandresorts.com/riviera-maya/partnerships.

Ultra-luxury all-inclusive resort in Riviera Maya. Has a pressroom (rivieramaya.grandvelas.com/newsroom) and influencer registration platform (grandvelasloscabos.jerne.app/register). USA PR contact: KWE Partners / msterritt@kwepublicrelations.com.

brand_name: Karisma Hotels & Resorts (El Dorado, Azul Beach)
notes: Multi-property luxury resort group in Riviera Maya including El Dorado Spa Resorts, Azul Beach Resorts, Generations Resorts. Actively runs influencer FAM trips. USA PR: pr@allianceconnection.com / mhollis@allianceconnection.com. Mexico PR: press@inkpr.com.
Dedicated Mexico and Latin America PR contact for Karisma Hotels & Resorts (El Dorado, Azul Beach, Nickelodeon Hotels). INK PR handles press and influencer inquiries for Mexican market.

brand_name: Playa Hotels & Resorts (Hyatt Ziva / Hyatt Zilara)
notes: Manages Hyatt Ziva Cancun, Hyatt Zilara Cancun, Hyatt Ziva Riviera Cancun. Has dedicated Social Influencer Form at playaresorts.com/social-influencer-form. Also groups@playaresorts.com and togroups@playaresorts.com.

Digital nomad and creator-focused hotel brand with locations in Tulum and Cancun. Each property is designed with local artists and tastemakers. Partnerships email: partnerships@selina.com. Very content-creator-friendly (coworking, community spaces).

World's 50 Best Hotels 2025 (Chable Yucatan). Leading Hotels of the World member. Two properties: Chable Yucatan (jungle) and Chable Maroma (beachfront Riviera Maya). Press page: chablehotels.com/chable-press. Reservations Maroma: reservations@chablemaroma.com.

Michelin Key 2024 & 2025 luxury beachfront resort in Tulum, pioneering since 2009. 250K Instagram followers. Expansive social media presence makes it ideal for influencer partnerships. Located at Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila KM 10.

Barefoot luxury hotel collection in Tulum including Ahau Tulum and Alaya Tulum. Adults-only, beachfront. Known for retreat groups and wellness programming. Email domain confirmed as @ahaucollection.com.

Major all-inclusive resort chain with multiple Cancun properties (RIU Cancun, RIU Caribe, RIU Palace Peninsula, etc.). Has a dedicated influencer platform at influencers.riu.com where creators apply for campaigns.
